text: @cnnbrk If you didn't watch "Decoding COVID-19" on PBS last night, you must stream it. Listen folk this is a the new normal, face masks, no hugging, no kissing, no hand shaking, COVID-19 has been found in sperm, so may be no sex. Please watch it, good bye old care free life.
